page.title: 12TRADE 1
page.content: 4 BOYS WENT TO GT HARWOOD MARKET WHICH IS HELD EVERY FRIDAY.THE MARKET COMPRISES OF THE FOLLOWING STALLS.JUDITH SPENCER HAS A STATIONERY STALL.SHE LIVES IN KNUZDEN.SHE HAS HAD A STALL IN GT HARWOOD FOR NEARLY 5 YEARS.AND HAS HAD ANOTHER STALL IN CLITHEROE.NEIL HARRIS HAS A FRUIT AND VEG STALL.HE LIVES IN GT HARWOOD AND HAS HAD A STALL IN GT HARWOOD FOR 17 AND A HALF YEARS AND HAS ANOTHER STALL IN RAWTENSTALL.MR WILMER HAS A HOME FARM PRODUCE STALL SELLING EGGS, CHEESE, BUTTER, MILK, BACON ETC.HE LIVES IN HOGHTON.HE HAS BEEN BRINGING HIS STALL TO GT HARWOOD FOR 26 YEARS AND HE HAS ANOTHER STALL IN DARWEN.MR PARRINGTON HAS A SHOES, TIGHTS AND TRAINERS STALL HE LIVES IN BURNLEY,HE HAS HAD A STALL IN GT.HARWOOD FOR 2 YEARS,
